about_the_game:
Action Roguelite meets FPS

Revenge of the Mage pulls the camera down right into the cowl of a mage so you can experience the magic and destruction in person! You will destroy the hordes of the damned, absorb their essences for power and save the multiverse!

Your Mage - Your Choice

You have a variety of Ancestors to choose from, each with different elemental powers. You will unlock even more as you play the game, providing new styles so you can find your favorite. After all, what’s the point in the destruction of hordes if not fun?

Diverse Playthroughs

With 30+ unique cards - we are adding more-  to be offered when you level up, each of which can be upgraded several times for greater effect, every playthrough will be different. Did we mention that we’re adding even more cards?

Revenge of the Mage aims to take the best parts of the action roguelites and shooters: A vast array of powers and challenges to choose from and legions of enemies so you can enjoy that power! The more you play, the more you unlock and the harder challenges you can take on.

Are you ready to take revenge? From who? We don’t even know. What matters is that you shoot enemies, avoid their shots, become more powerful and keep doing that!

  • You can play with many unique Active and Passive Spells.

  • Unlock different Ancestors for your desired gameplay.

  • Progress through!

  • Defeat powerful champions and bosses!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: No recommendation
  • Additional Notes: We recommend installing it on an SSD for better performance.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-11700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: RotM is an Action Roguelite FPS game where players get in the robes of a Mage. Let the hands of fate open ways for the power of your magic. Save the Multiverse to power up yourself! Unlock, collect, discover, live, die, repeat!
supported_languages: English, German, Turkish, Russian, Simplified Chinese
